mapper.insert: insert into User(userID, userIdentity, username, password, image) values (#{userID}, #{userIdentity}, #{username}, #{password}, #{image})
mapper.select: select userID, authorID, username, realName, image, userDegree, userIdentity, organization, emailAddress, phoneNumber, introduction from User where (userID = #{ID} or username = #{ID} or emailAddress = #{ID}) and password = #{password} limit 0,1
